value.title: Healthcare startup Abridge raises $150 mln for AI model for clinicians
value.excerpt: Feb 23 (Reuters) - Abridge, a startup building artificial intelligence-powered clinical documentation tools, has raised $150 million in a Series C round, the company told Reuters, as more investors seek exposure to industry-specific generative AI applications.

value.title: Light therapy helps ease pain for cancer patients
value.excerpt: Neck and head cancer patients will be able to seek a new treatment to ease the pain of radiotherapy and chemotherapy Cancer patients at a hospital trust have started using light therapy to help them with side effects caused by chemotherapy and radiotherapy.

value.title: Availity Issues Statement of Principles on Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare
value.excerpt: Availity, the nation's largest real-time health information network, issued the company's Responsible Artificial Intelligence (AI) Principles. The principles represent Availity's commitment to the development, integration, and deployment of AI-powered tools to maximize meaningful and beneficial use in the delivery of healthcare.

value.title: Georgia bill aims to restrict AI in healthcare
value.excerpt: House Bill 887 was introduced to the Georgia House of Representatives by Rep. Mandisha Ann-Marie Thomas to: The bill states insurers cannot use just AI tools for coverage decisions, and any decision made with AI or automation tools should be "meaningfully reviewed" by a knowledgeable person who can override the AI's decision.
